brief_title: Baclofen for the Treatment of Cocaine Dependence - 1
brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the efficacy and safety of baclofen for the treatment of cocaine dependence.
detailed_description: Double-blind, placebo-controlled, parallel design trial of baclofen for the treatment of cocaine dependence
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - Subject must have DSM-IV diagnosis of cocaine dependence. - Subject must be seeking treatment for cocaine dependence. - Be be able to verbalize understanding of consent form, provide written consent and verbalize willingness to complete study procedures. Exclusion Criteria: - Please contact site for more information.
